paragraph.heading: 1Contract view
paragraph.paragraph:
The contract view
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_format_contract_color.gif displays the contracts of all written-in features of the current class. It is available either through the
/tools/eiffelstudio/reference/20_editor/index.xml editor or through the Class tab of the
/tools/eiffelstudio/reference/05_general_interface_description/20_eiffelstudio_window_overview.xml context tool .
